original_text: This is the law for him who has a discharge and for him who has an emission of semen, becoming unclean thereby;
korean_text: 이 규례는 유출병이 있는 자와 설정함으로 부정하게 된 자와

sentences.original_text: for him who has a discharge
and for him who has an emission of semen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 정액을 유출하는 사람을 위한 것이며
